quote: Life is simple, we make it difficult.
The most important thing is to enjoy your life, be happy no matter what.
Life is not about finding yourself, life is making yourself.
Life is a dream for those who are wise, a game for those who are stupid, comedy for those who are rich, and a tragedy for those who are poor.
The truth is, you don't know what will happen tomorrow. Life is a crazy ride and no one guarantees it.
Our goal in life is to be happy.
The good life is a life inspired by love and guided by science.
A thousand parents can dream, one young man can change the world.
Education is the most powerful weapon to change the world.
Effort and courage are not enough without purpose and planning direction.
This world is enough to meet human needs, not to satisfy human greed.
If you think you're too small to make a difference, try sleeping in a room with a mosquito.
You may be able to procrastinate, but time will not wait.
You don't have to be extraordinary to start, but you have to start to be extraordinary.
Don't spend your time beating walls and hoping to turn them into doors.
Nothing will work unless you do it.
You can't go back and change the beginning when you started, but you can start again where you are now and change the ending.
Some people dream of success, while others wake up every morning to make it happen.
Small jobs done done are better than big plans just discussed.
We must mean to ourselves first before we become a person of value to others.
We must mean to ourselves first before becoming a person of value to others.
The most painful thing is to lose who you are when you love someone too much. And forget that you are actually special too.
Some people will leave your life, but that's not the end of your story. It's just the end of their part in your story.
Love is so short, but forgetting takes so long.
A person will never know how deep his love is until there is a separation.
Romance is like glass. Sometimes it's better to leave it broken than to hurt yourself by putting them back together.
Love is like the wind. You can't see it, but you can feel it.
Love is when someone else's happiness is more important than yours.
Romance is not just looking at each other. But, also looking in the same direction.
How do you spell ‘love’? asked Piglet. You don't have to spell it, just feel it, answered Pooh.
Life is 10 percent what happens to you and 90 percent how you respond to it.
The only limitation in m living is bad manners.
A person who dares to waste an hour of his time does not know the value of life.
What we think determines what will happen to us. So if we want to change our lives, we need to change our minds a little.
He who does more than what he is paid will someday be paid more than what he does.
I always try to turn misfortune into opportunity.
A person who has made a mistake and never corrected it means he has made one more mistake.
Some people dream of their success, while others wake up every morning to make their dreams come true.
You will never learn patience and courage if in this world there is only happiness.
It's okay to celebrate success, but it's more important to heed the lessons of failure.
Hoping to be friends is quick, but friendship is a fruit that takes a long time to ripen.
Listen, smile and just agree. Then do whatever you really wanted to do from the start.
If you don't want to look stupid for once, nothing big will happen to you.
Never argue with stupid people because other people who see will not be able to guess who is the most stupid.
Beauty is only outer skin. However, what is very important is the balance between mind, body, and spirit.
Silence is better than saying meaningless words.
Do something brave and you won't regret it.
If you can't make something good, at least make it look good.
By giving people the power to share, we make the world more transparent.
If you think you are too small to make a difference, try sleeping in a room with a mosquito.
Fun in a job makes perfection in the results achieved.
Success and failure are both part of life. Both are temporary.
Life is already difficult and sometimes there are many problems. For that, sometimes life just needs to be laughed at.
Be like a pineapple. Stand tall, wear a crown, and be sweet inside.
Some people create happiness wherever he goes, while others create happiness every time he goes.
It is better to fight and lose than never to fight at all.
Let us always do better because until now we have not done anything.
You won't be able to escape responsibilities tomorrow by avoiding them today.
God often visits us, but most of us are not at home.
If you were a CEO, you would have to do all kinds of work that you might not want to do.
I feel that the best companies start not because the founders wanted a company, but because the founders wanted to change the world.
Education is the most powerful weapon to change the world.
You may be able to procrastinate, but time won't wait.
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future simply by changing his current attitude.
Count your age with friends, not years. Count your life with smiles, not tears.
Profit and loss are two sides of the same coin. Too afraid of loss is the same as running away from profit.
Every phase you go through must be able to bring lessons to move up to the next phase.
by: Merry Riana, A Million Dollar Dream

quote: To stop dreaming is the greatest tragedy in human life.
Man jadda wajada. Who is serious, will succeed.
Positive thinking is one of the best ways when you have no choice.
Everyone can have a dream, but not everyone can raise high spirits.
I don't speak the word maybe.
Everything seems impossible until everything is done.
You can't escape tomorrow's responsibilities by avoiding them today
You want to know who you are? Don't ask. Take action!
Keep your eyes on the stars with your feet on the ground.
Effort and courage are not enough without a purpose and planning direction
You may be able to procrastinate, but time won't wait
The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future simply by changing his current attitude.
Keep your face always towards the sun, so the shadows will fall behind you.
Don't spend your time beating walls and hoping to turn them into doors.
Success is when preparation and opportunity meet.
Control your destiny, or someone else will
Small jobs done are better than big plans just discussed.
A bright future is never promised to anyone. You have to pursue it yourself.
What keeps me growing are my life goals.
Nothing will work unless you do it.
If people knew how hard I worked to get this skill of mine, I wouldn't look amazing.
Change your life today. Don't bet on the future, act now without delay.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
It doesn't matter how slow you go as long as you don't stop.
Successful people will take advantage of mistakes and try again in a different way.
Effort will pay off once one does not give up.
Brightness is doing the ordinary in the most extraordinary way.
Fun in a job makes perfection in the results achieved.
Don't settle for what life gives you; make life better and build something.
